title: Family decision-making includes Margaret's voice
content:
Scenario: Family decision-making includes Margaret's voice
    Given Margaret makes substantial contributions to family flourishing
    And family decisions affect her care capacity
    When family decisions are being made
    Then Margaret's care contributions should give her legitimate standing
    And her voice should carry weight in family governance
    And decisions should consider impact on her care capacity
    And Margaret should be respected as autonomous adult contributor
    And family governance should be multigenerational and equitable
    And her retirement doesn't diminish her authority in family
